animeDescription: In the mountains of India, a man named Takeshi Yamato gains the abilities of the legendary Rainbow Warrior, allowing him to transform into Rainbowman. With this power, he has to stop aliens from invading the earth.
animeStaff: [['Okaseko Nobuhiro', ['Director', 'Animation Director']], ['Hata Yoshito', ['Episode Director']], ['Itou Tsunehisa', ['Script']], ['Royal Knights', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
